name: Donations or grants to department
text: §334-7  Donations or grants to department.  The department of health is authorized to accept donations or grants from individuals and other agencies, public and private, to further the purposes of the mental health program.  The donations or grants shall in fact be used for the mental health program and for the intended purpose, if specified. [L 1967, c 259, pt of §1; HRS §334-7]
